delete.title: Delete Project

timesheets.title: Timesheets
timesheets.subtitle: Track your time and submit for approval
timesheets.no_timesheets_message: Start tracking your time by entering hours for the current week.
timesheets.impersonation_banner: You are entering time on behalf of {name}. All entries will be attributed to their timesheet.

entry.title: Add Time Entry
entry.dialog_desc: Select a project and optionally a task and billing role for this entry.

grid.add_entry_prompt: Add an entry to start tracking your time
grid.no_entries_readonly: No time entries for this week

actions.submit_message: Are you sure you want to submit this timesheet for approval? You won't be able to make changes after submission.
actions.copy_confirm: Copy entries from previous week? This will replace current entries.

approval.title: Approval
approval.no_pending_message: Timesheets from your team members will appear here when submitted

team.title: Team Timesheets
team.subtitle: View and manage team timesheet submissions
team.reject_reason: Please provide a reason for rejection (optional):
team.no_timesheet: Employee has not started their timesheet for this week
team.reject_description: Provide an optional reason for the rejection. This will be visible to the employee.

reminders.confirm: Send reminder emails to {count} employees who haven't submitted their timesheets?

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.subtitle: Track your expenses and submit for approval
expenses.no_expenses_message: Start logging your expenses for the week.

list.no_reports_desc: Start tracking your expenses by creating a report for the current week

detail.title: Expenses: {weekRange}
detail.impersonation_banner: You are entering expenses on behalf of {name}. All entries will be attributed to their expense report.

grid.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this expense entry?

entry.title: Expense
entry.add_desc: Add a new expense entry for this week.
entry.required_fields: Please fill in all required fields

actions.submit_desc: This will submit your expense report for manager approval. You won't be able to make changes until it's approved or rejected.
actions.not_editable: This expense report is {status} and cannot be edited.

approval.title: Approval
approval.no_pending_message: There are no expenses waiting for approval.
approval.reject_desc: This will return the expense report to {name} for revision. Optionally provide a reason for rejection.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.subtitle: Create and manage client invoices
invoices.no_invoices_message: Get started by creating your first invoice.

wizard.title: New Invoice
wizard.step1_desc: Choose the client and project to invoice
wizard.step3_desc: Review details and create the invoice
wizard.select_client_to_see_projects: Select a client to see their projects
wizard.no_projects_warning: This client has no active projects. Create a project first.
wizard.ready_to_continue: Ready to continue. Click Continue to select time entries.
wizard.no_entries_message: There are no approved, unbilled time entries for this project.
wizard.no_entries_in_period: There are no approved, billable time entries available for this project in the selected period.
wizard.notes_placeholder: Add any notes for this invoice (e.g., payment terms, special instructions)...
wizard.creating_info: Creating invoice... You can send it from the detail page.
wizard.validation_select_client_project: Please select a client and project
wizard.validation_select_entries: Please select at least one entry

actions.mark_paid_description: This will mark the invoice as paid. This action cannot be undone.
actions.cancel_description: This will void the invoice and unlock any associated timesheets. The timesheet entries will be available for re-invoicing.
actions.delete_description: This will permanently delete the invoice. This action cannot be undone.

send.title: Send Invoice
send.send_description: Send this invoice as PDF to {client}
send.no_email_warning: This client does not have a billing email on file. Please enter the recipient email manually.
send.message_placeholder: Add a personal note to include in the email...
send.message_help: This message will be included in the email body along with the invoice details.
send.validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address

edit.title: Edit Invoice
edit.subtitle: Update invoice {number} for {client}
edit.line_items_readonly: Line items cannot be edited after creation. To change items, cancel this invoice and create a new one.
edit.notes_placeholder: Add any notes for this invoice (e.g., payment terms, special instructions)...

batch.title: Batch Invoicing
batch.subtitle: Generate invoices for all clients with approved timesheets
batch.preview_description: Review clients with approved timesheets for the selected week
batch.no_clients_message: There are no clients with approved, unbilled timesheets for this week.
batch.no_clients_selected: Please select at least one client

timesheets.title: Timesheet Report
timesheets.subtitle: View timesheet hours by user, project, and date range
timesheets.card_description: View detailed timesheet data filtered by date range, user, or project. Track billable vs non-billable hours and calculate labor value.
timesheets.no_data: No timesheet data found for the selected filters.

invoices.title: Invoice Report
invoices.subtitle: View invoices by client, status, and date range with aging analysis
invoices.card_description: Track invoices by status and client with aging analysis. Monitor outstanding balances and payment trends.
invoices.no_data: No invoice data found for the selected filters.

profitability.title: Profitability Report
profitability.subtitle: View project profitability with labor costs, expenses, and margins
profitability.card_description: Analyze project profitability by comparing labor costs and expenses against invoiced revenue. Track profit margins across all projects.
profitability.no_data: No project data found for the selected filters.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions

users.edit_subtitle: Update user information and role assignment
users.email_readonly: Email is managed by Supabase Auth and cannot be changed here.
users.role_assignment_description: Assign a role and reporting manager
users.is_active_description: Inactive users cannot log in or access the system.
users.activate_message: Are you sure you want to activate {name}? They will be able to log in again.
users.deactivate_message: Are you sure you want to deactivate {name}? They will no longer be able to log in.
users.password_reset_message: A password reset email will be sent to {email}. They will be able to set a new password.
users.password_reset_error: Failed to send password reset email

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.subtitle: View role permissions and access levels (read-only)
roles.summary_description: Overview of all roles and their permission counts

company_settings.title: Company Settings
company_settings.subtitle: This information appears on invoices and other documents

tax_numbers.title: Tax Numbers
tax_numbers.subtitle: These numbers appear in the invoice footer

logo.title: Company Logo
logo.subtitle: Logo appears on invoice PDFs. Accepted formats: PNG, JPG, SVG (max 2MB)
